go_data.term: transforming growth factor beta-activated receptor activity
go_data.justification: TGFBR1 forms a complex with TGFBR2 to mediate TGF-beta superfamily ligand-dependent signalling.

go_data.term: cellular response to transforming growth factor beta stimulus
go_data.justification: TGFBR1 is involved in TGF-beta1-dependent signalling pathway.
TGFBR1 forms a complex with TGFBR2.
